CustomField.description: Enable to show auto advance option for a participant in the survey responder interface.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose how the survey navigates when a single-choice question is answered: Disabled - The survey responder remains on the same question and must manually advance. Enabled - Always Auto Advance - Automatically moves to the next question after a selection is made. Enabled - Auto Advance with Responder Override - Allows the survey participaints to decide whether questions advance automatically or require manual advancement.
CustomField.label: Auto-Advance on Single-Select

value.fullName: Enabled - Auto Advance with Responder Override
value.label: Enabled - Auto Advance with Responder Override
